resources.string:
1. The Go APPs connected in by third-parties platform belong to those third-party companies. Please follow the usage agreement and rules of the respective APP. 

 2. The account security, data storage and business logic of the APPs of the third-party platforms belong to the application scope of the their own APPs, which has no direct relationship with Yinzhi Electronic Chessboard. Yinzhi Electronic Chessboard only provides functions like a mouse or display. 

 3. As the third-party softwares may be updated at any time by themselves, there may be a certain time delay in our docking. Please understand and give feedback in time. 

 4. As the design of the third-party platform's APPs is not under our control, there is a risk of uncontrollable use experience and performance of its products on this device, such as stopping service, no longer supporting the operating system of the device, etc. Once this happens, we will stop connecting the APP.
Note: Make sure that you can only start service when it\'s your turn to play chess.
This is a third party game service. Please turn on.
Failed to get latest version number
After the game record is saved, you can query it in the standard version application. Do you want to save the current game record?
If the selection is not in the correct position, you can restart and try again
